Intro: ^Oh... oh hi! I was wondering when you’d find me here.
^Any longer and I would’ve started making friends with fungi...
^But now you’re here! And I’m so glad!

c-1: ^Uh-huh! Think of me as your roomie. I’m mostly here to keep you company… and maybe remind you to drink water. Maybe.

g-1: ^I-I promise I won’t take up too much space!
^Anyway, now that you’re here… can I ask you a few things?

c-2: ^We can do a questionnaire! It’s easier to keep record that way.
^Perfect! I’ll do my best to match your pace!

c-0: ^Don't forget to check out the to-do list and get a hefty lot done!
c-1: ^Well, I'm happy that things arn't *that* bad. Sometimes, 'meh' is still a win!
c-2: ^Some days things just go south, and there's nothing you can do about it
^Today might not be the day for you, and thats okay.
^It's always important to take care of yourself! And I'll be rooting for you!
^I've heard this saying from a friend..."Tomorrow is by definition better"

c-0: ^Let go of all your worries for now, and get a hearty sleep
c-1: ^I'll keep the lights on. You can turn them off when you're ready for bedtime.
^Don't stay up *too* late! And try not to pull an all-nighter if you can
